last_phrase: In conclusion, the act of witnessing and incorporating various states of being can facilitate healing from trauma. By talking to our age-regressed inner child and providing it with resources and support, we can merge these parts of ourselves and expand our ability to respond fully in the present moment. The approach used by Erickson in the case of the "February Man" provides a prototype for this method of healing.
